```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

# 30 Day Lag Exposures

```{r}
lags <- read_rds("output_files/exposures_30day_lags.rds")
```

```{r}
lag_summary <- lags %>%
  group_by(pollutant, metric) %>%
  summarise(average = mean(val, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
ggplot(lag_summary, aes(x = metric, y = average, group = pollutant, color =pollutant)) +
  geom_line() + 
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  scale_y_sqrt()
```
